CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: This result leads us to conclude that PTATDPP retains a higher crystalline nature in the blend with PC71BM , affording a better hole transporting pathway and thus exhibiting a higher J SC and FF than PTAFDPP.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. PTATDPP (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene))
2. PC71BM (Poly(7,7-dioctyl-b-phenylene vinylene))
3. PTAFDPP (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene-alt-4-fluorophenylene))
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! My apologies for the confusion earlier. Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph:

1. PTATDPP
2. PC71BM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid Material Name entities in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PTATDPP |
| PC71BM |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: This result leads us to conclude that PTATDPP retains a higher crystalline nature in the blend with PC71BM , affording a better hole transporting pathway and thus exhibiting a higher J SC and FF than PTAFDPP.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. J SC (Joule-Schottky coefficient) - a measure of the efficiency of the hole transporting pathway.
2. FF (fill factor) - a measure of the efficiency of the solar cell.
3. PC71BM (phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester) - a material used in the blend with PTATDPP, which affects the crystalline nature and hole transporting pathway.
4. PTAFDPP (phenyl-t-amyl-furfuryl-diphenyl-phosphine oxide) - a material used in the blend with PC71BM, which also affects the crystalline nature and hole transporting pathway.

These entities are mentioned in the paragraph as they relate to the properties of the materials being studied and their impact on the performance of the solar cell.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Of course! Here are the relevant entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. J SC (Joule-Schottky coefficient) - a measure of the efficiency of the hole transporting pathway.
2. FF (fill factor) - a measure of the efficiency of the solar cell.

These two entities are the only ones that refer directly to the value of material properties in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| J SC |
| FF |

These are the only entities mentioned in the paragraph that refer directly to the value of material properties.
